trans-unit.source: Until the initial handshake has completed, this method returns a session object which reports an invalid cipher suite of "SSL_NULL_WITH_NULL_NULL".

trans-unit.source: Unwraps a byte array received from the client.
trans-unit.target: 解开从客户端接收的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: Unwraps a byte array received from the client. This method can be called only after the authentication exchange has completed (i.e., when isComplete() returns true) and only if the authentication exchange has negotiated integrity and/or privacy as the quality of protection; otherwise, an IllegalStateException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 解包从客户端收到的字节数组。仅在身份验证交换完成后（即 isComplete() 返回true时），并且仅当身份验证交换已协商完整性和/或隐私作为保护质量时，才可以调用此方法。否则，将 IllegalStateException 。

trans-unit.source: Unwraps a byte array received from the server.
trans-unit.target: 解开从服务器接收的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: Unwraps a byte array received from the server. This method can be called only after the authentication exchange has completed (i.e., when isComplete() returns true) and only if the authentication exchange has negotiated integrity and/or privacy as the quality of protection; otherwise, an IllegalStateException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 解包从服务器收到的字节数组。仅在身份验证交换完成后（即 isComplete() 返回true时），并且仅当身份验证交换已协商完整性和/或隐私作为保护质量时，才可以调用此方法。否则，将 IllegalStateException 。

trans-unit.source: Update elemVec with the list of elements that are part of the this contentModel.
trans-unit.target: 用属于这个contentModel的元素列表更新elemVec。

trans-unit.source: Update or extend the validity period for this Object.
trans-unit.target: 更新或延长此 Object 的有效期。

trans-unit.source: Update the child state.
trans-unit.target: 更新孩子的状态。

trans-unit.source: Update the child state. This should be called by the thread that desires to spend time updating the child state (intended to be the layout thread).
trans-unit.target: 更新子状态。这应该由希望花时间更新子状态的线程(打算是布局线程)调用。

trans-unit.source: Update the digest using the specified ByteBuffer.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的ByteBuffer更新摘要。

trans-unit.source: Update the digest using the specified ByteBuffer. The digest is updated using the input.remaining() bytes starting at input.position(). Upon return, the buffer's position will be equal to its limit; its limit will not have changed.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的ByteBuffer更新摘要。摘要是使用更新的 input.remaining() 字节开始 input.position() 。返回时，缓冲区的位置将等于其极限；它的限制不会改变。

trans-unit.source: Update the flow on the given FlowView.
trans-unit.target: 更新给定FlowView上的流程。

trans-unit.source: Update the flow on the given FlowView. By default, this causes all of the rows (child views) to be rebuilt to match the given constraints for each row. This is called by a FlowView.layout to update the child views in the flow.
trans-unit.target: 更新给定FlowView上的流程。默认情况下,这将导致所有的行(子视图)被重建,以匹配每行的给定约束。FlowView.layout会调用这个方法来更新流程中的子视图。

trans-unit.source: Update the layout in response to receiving notification of change from the model.
trans-unit.target: 更新布局,以响应收到模型的变更通知。

trans-unit.source: Update the layout in response to receiving notification of change from the model. This is implemented to note the change on the ChildLocator so that offsets of the children will be correctly computed.
trans-unit.target: 更新布局,以响应从模型收到的更改通知。实现这个功能是为了在ChildLocator上记录变化,以便正确计算子代的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Update the relevant ProtectionDomains with the Principals from the Subject associated with this SubjectDomainCombiner.
trans-unit.target: 使用与此 SubjectDomainCombiner 关联的 Subject 中的主体更新相关的ProtectionDomain 。

trans-unit.source: UpdateAction
trans-unit.target: UpdateAction

trans-unit.source: Updates (replace) the access control list.
trans-unit.target: 更新(替换)访问控制列表。

trans-unit.source: Updates a file's last modified time attribute.
trans-unit.target: 更新文件的最后修改时间属性。

trans-unit.source: Updates a file's last modified time attribute. The file time is converted to the epoch and precision supported by the file system. Converting from finer to coarser granularities result in precision loss. The behavior of this method when attempting to set the last modified time when it is not supported by the file system or is outside the range supported by the underlying file store is not defined. It may or not fail by throwing an IOException.
trans-unit.target: 更新文件的上次修改时间属性。文件时间将转换为文件系统支持的纪元和精度。从较细粒度转换为较粗粒度会导致精度损失。未定义文件系统不支持或超出基础文件存储支持的范围时，尝试设置上次修改时间时此方法的行为。通过抛出 IOException 可能会失败，也可能不会失败。

trans-unit.source: Updates a scroll bar display policy.
trans-unit.target: 更新滚动条显示策略。

trans-unit.source: Updates any document structure as a result of text removal.
trans-unit.target: 在删除文本后,更新任何文档结构。

trans-unit.source: Updates any document structure as a result of text removal. This method is called after the text has been removed from the Content. This will happen within a write lock. If a subclass of this class reimplements this method, it should delegate to the superclass as well.
trans-unit.target: 在删除文本后更新任何文档结构。这个方法在文本从Content中被删除后被调用。这将发生在一个写锁内。如果这个类的子类重新实现了这个方法,它也应该委托给超类。

trans-unit.source: Updates any document structure as a result of text removal. This method is called before the text is actually removed from the Content. This will happen within a write lock. If a subclass of this class reimplements this method, it should delegate to the superclass as well.
trans-unit.target: 更新任何文档结构作为文本删除的结果。这个方法在文本实际从Content中删除之前被调用。这将发生在写锁内。如果这个类的子类重新实现了这个方法,它也应该委托给超类。

trans-unit.source: Updates any document structure as a result of text removal. This will happen within a write lock. Since the structure represents a line map, this just checks to see if the removal spans lines. If it does, the two lines outside of the removal area are joined together.
trans-unit.target: 更新任何文档结构作为文本删除的结果。这将发生在一个写锁内。由于该结构代表了一个行图,所以这只是检查删除是否跨越了行。如果跨行,则将删除区域外的两行连接在一起。

trans-unit.source: Updates any or all of the file's last modified time, last access time, and create time attributes.
trans-unit.target: 更新文件的最后修改时间、最后访问时间和创建时间的任何或所有属性。

trans-unit.source: Updates column header.
trans-unit.target: 更新列头。

trans-unit.source: Updates document structure as a result of text insertion.
trans-unit.target: 在插入文本后更新文档结构。

trans-unit.source: Updates document structure as a result of text insertion. This will happen within a write lock. If a subclass of this class reimplements this method, it should delegate to the superclass as well.
trans-unit.target: 在插入文本后更新文档结构。这将发生在一个写锁内。如果这个类的子类重新实现了这个方法,它也应该委托给超类。

trans-unit.source: Updates document structure as a result of text insertion. This will happen within a write lock. Since this document simply maps out lines, we refresh the line map.
trans-unit.target: 在插入文本后更新文档结构。这将发生在一个写锁内。由于这个文档只是简单地映射出行,我们刷新行图。

trans-unit.source: Updates document structure as a result of text insertion. This will happen within a write lock. This implementation simply parses the inserted content for line breaks and builds up a set of instructions for the element buffer.
trans-unit.target: 在插入文本后更新文档结构。这将发生在一个写锁内。这个实现只是简单地解析插入的内容,并为元素缓冲区建立一套指令。

trans-unit.source: Updates document structure as a result of text removal.
trans-unit.target: 在删除文本后更新文档结构。

trans-unit.source: Updates how much each depth should be offset by.
trans-unit.target: 更新每个深度应该偏移多少。

trans-unit.source: Updates made to a file may be forced out to the underlying storage device, ensuring that data are not lost in the event of a system crash.
trans-unit.target: 对文件所做的更新可能会被 forced out 到基础存储设备，以确保在系统崩溃的情况下不会丢失数据。

trans-unit.source: Updates made to a file may be forced out to the underlying storage device, ensuring that data are not lost in the event of a system crash.
trans-unit.target: 对文件所做的更新可能会被 forced out 到基础存储设备，以确保在系统崩溃时不会丢失数据。

trans-unit.source: Updates made to a file may be forced out to the underlying storage device, ensuring that data are not lost in the event of a system crash.
trans-unit.target: 对文件所做的更新可能会被 forced out 到基础存储设备，以确保在系统崩溃时不会丢失数据。

trans-unit.source: Updates module source in the layer to export a package to module target.
trans-unit.target: 更新该层中的模块 source ，以将包导出到模块 target 。

trans-unit.source: Updates module source in the layer to export a package to module target. This method is a no-op if source already exports the package to at least target.
trans-unit.target: 更新该层中的模块 source ，以将包导出到模块 target 。如果 source 已将包导出到至少 target ,则此方法为no-op 。

trans-unit.source: Updates module source in the layer to open a package to module target.
trans-unit.target: 更新该层中的模块 source ，以打开到模块 target 的包。

trans-unit.source: Updates module source in the layer to open a package to module target. This method is a no-op if source already opens the package to at least target.
trans-unit.target: 更新该层中的模块 source ，以打开到模块 target 的包。如果 source 已将包至少打开到 target ,则此方法为no-op 。

trans-unit.source: Updates module source in the layer to read module target.
trans-unit.target: 更新该层中的模块 source 以读取模块 target 。

trans-unit.source: Updates module source in the layer to read module target. This method is a no-op if source already reads target.
trans-unit.target: 更新该层中的模块 source 以读取模块 target 。如果 source 已读取 target ,则此方法为空操作。

trans-unit.source: Updates the TextMeasurer after a single character has been deleted from the paragraph currently represented by this TextMeasurer.
trans-unit.target: 更新 TextMeasurer 单个字符后已经从段落删除当前这代表 TextMeasurer 。

trans-unit.source: Updates the TextMeasurer after a single character has been deleted from the paragraph currently represented by this TextMeasurer. After this call, this TextMeasurer is equivalent to a new TextMeasurer created from the text; however, it will usually be more efficient to update an existing TextMeasurer than to create a new one from scratch.
trans-unit.target: 更新 TextMeasurer 单个字符后已经从段落删除当前这代表 TextMeasurer 。调用之后，此 TextMeasurer 等效于根据文本创建的新 TextMeasurer ；但是，更新现有的 TextMeasurer 通常比从头开始创建新的TextMeasurer更为有效。

trans-unit.source: Updates the TextMeasurer after a single character has been inserted into the paragraph currently represented by this TextMeasurer.
trans-unit.target: 更新 TextMeasurer 单个字符已经被插入到当前这个表示的段落后 TextMeasurer 。

trans-unit.source: Updates the TextMeasurer after a single character has been inserted into the paragraph currently represented by this TextMeasurer. After this call, this TextMeasurer is equivalent to a new TextMeasurer created from the text; however, it will usually be more efficient to update an existing TextMeasurer than to create a new one from scratch.
trans-unit.target: 更新 TextMeasurer 单个字符已经被插入到当前这个表示的段落后 TextMeasurer 。调用之后，此 TextMeasurer 等效于根据文本创建的新 TextMeasurer ；但是，更新现有的 TextMeasurer 通常比从头开始创建新的TextMeasurer更为有效。

trans-unit.source: Updates the expandedState.

trans-unit.target: 更新 preferredSize 实例变量，该实例变量从 getPreferredSize() 返回。

trans-unit.source: Updates the CRC-32 checksum with the bytes from the specified buffer.
trans-unit.target: 用指定缓冲区的字节更新CRC-32校验和。

trans-unit.source: Updates the CRC-32 checksum with the bytes from the specified buffer. The checksum is updated with the remaining bytes in the buffer, starting at the buffer's position. Upon return, the buffer's position will be updated to its limit; its limit will not have been changed.
trans-unit.target: 用指定缓冲区的字节更新CRC-32校验和。从缓冲区的位置开始,用缓冲区中的剩余字节更新校验和。返回时,缓冲区的位置将被更新到其极限值,其极限值不会被改变。

trans-unit.source: Updates the CRC-32 checksum with the specified array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的字节数组更新CRC-32校验和。

trans-unit.source: Updates the CRC-32 checksum with the specified byte (the low eight bits of the argument b).
trans-unit.target: 用指定的字节(参数b的低八位)更新CRC-32校验和。

trans-unit.source: Updates the CRC-32C checksum with the bytes from the specified buffer.
trans-unit.target: 用指定缓冲区的字节更新CRC-32C校验和。

trans-unit.source: Updates the CRC-32C checksum with the bytes from the specified buffer. The checksum is updated with the remaining bytes in the buffer, starting at the buffer's position. Upon return, the buffer's position will be updated to its limit; its limit will not have been changed.
trans-unit.target: 用指定缓冲区的字节更新CRC-32C校验和。从缓冲区的位置开始,用缓冲区中的剩余字节更新校验和。返回时,缓冲区的位置将被更新到其极限值,其极限值不会被改变。

trans-unit.source: Updates the CRC-32C checksum with the specified array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的字节数组更新CRC-32C校验和。

trans-unit.source: Updates the CRC-32C checksum with the specified byte (the low eight bits of the argument b).
trans-unit.target: 用指定的字节(参数b的低八位)更新CRC-32C校验和。

trans-unit.source: Updates the TreeState in response to nodes expanding/collapsing.
trans-unit.target: 根据节点的扩展/折叠更新TreeState。

trans-unit.source: Updates the UIs for the labels in the label table by calling updateUI on each label.
trans-unit.target: 通过在每个标签上调用 updateUI 来更新标签表中标签的UI 。

trans-unit.source: Updates the UIs for the labels in the label table by calling updateUI on each label. The UIs are updated from the current look and feel. The labels are also set to their preferred size.
trans-unit.target: 通过在每个标签上调用 updateUI 来更新标签表中标签的UI 。用户界面会根据当前外观进行更新。标签也设置为它们的首选大小。

trans-unit.source: Updates the array reference that will be returned by subsequent calls to the getData method.
trans-unit.target: 更新将由后续对 getData 方法的调用返回的数组引用。

trans-unit.source: Updates the button's state in response to property changes in the associated action.
trans-unit.target: 根据相关动作的属性变化更新按钮的状态。

trans-unit.source: Updates the button's state in response to property changes in the associated action. This method is invoked from the PropertyChangeListener returned from createActionPropertyChangeListener. Subclasses do not normally need to invoke this. Subclasses that support additional Action properties should override this and configurePropertiesFromAction.
trans-unit.target: 响应于相关操作中的属性更改，更新按钮的状态。从 createActionPropertyChangeListener 返回的 PropertyChangeListener 调用此方法。子类通常不需要调用此方法。支持其他 Action 属性的子类应重写此属性，并应 configurePropertiesFromAction 。

trans-unit.source: Updates the cellEditor based on the editability of the JTree that we're contained in.
trans-unit.target: 根据我们所包含的JTree的可编辑性更新cellEditor。

trans-unit.source: Updates the cellEditor based on the editability of the JTree that we're contained in. If the tree is editable but doesn't have a cellEditor, a basic one will be used.
trans-unit.target: 根据我们所在的JTree的可编辑性更新cellEditor。如果树是可编辑的,但没有cellEditor,将使用一个基本的cellEditor。

trans-unit.source: Updates the checksum with the bytes from the specified buffer.
trans-unit.target: 用指定缓冲区的字节更新校验和。

trans-unit.source: Updates the checksum with the bytes from the specified buffer. The checksum is updated using buffer.remaining() bytes starting at buffer.position() Upon return, the buffer's position will be updated to its limit; its limit will not have been changed.
trans-unit.target: 使用来自指定缓冲区的字节更新校验和。校验和使用缓冲区更新。从缓冲区开始的 remaining() 字节数。 position() 返回时，缓冲区的位置将更新到其限制；其限制将不会更改。

trans-unit.source: Updates the checksum with the bytes from the specified buffer. The checksum is updated with the remaining bytes in the buffer, starting at the buffer's position. Upon return, the buffer's position will be updated to its limit; its limit will not have been changed.
trans-unit.target: 用指定缓冲区的字节更新校验和。从缓冲区的位置开始,用缓冲区中的剩余字节更新校验和。当返回时,缓冲区的位置将被更新到它的极限,它的极限不会被改变。

trans-unit.source: Updates the checksum with the specified array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的字节数组更新校验和。

trans-unit.source: Updates the checksum with the specified byte (the low eight bits of the argument b).
trans-unit.target: 用指定的字节(参数b的低8位)更新校验和。

trans-unit.source: Updates the child views in response to receiving notification that the model changed, and there is change record for the element this view is responsible for.
trans-unit.target: 更新子视图,以响应收到模型变化的通知,并且该视图负责的元素有变化记录。

trans-unit.source: Updates the child views in response to receiving notification that the model changed, and there is change record for the element this view is responsible for. This is implemented to assume the child views are directly responsible for the child elements of the element this view represents. The ViewFactory is used to create child views for each element specified as added in the ElementChange, starting at the index specified in the given ElementChange. The number of child views representing the removed elements specified are removed.
trans-unit.target: 响应于接收到有关模型已更改的通知而更新子视图，并且该视图负责的元素有更改记录。假定子视图直接负责该视图表示的元素的子元素，将其实现。所述 ViewFactory 用于创建如加入在指定的每个子元素的观点 ElementChange ，开始在给定的指定的索引在 ElementChange 。表示指定的已删除元素的子视图数已删除。

trans-unit.source: Updates the combobox's state in response to property changes in associated action.
trans-unit.target: 根据相关动作的属性变化更新组合框的状态。

trans-unit.source: Updates the combobox's state in response to property changes in associated action. This method is invoked from the PropertyChangeListener returned from createActionPropertyChangeListener. Subclasses do not normally need to invoke this. Subclasses that support additional Action properties should override this and configurePropertiesFromAction.
trans-unit.target: 响应于关联操作中的属性更改，更新组合框的状态。从 createActionPropertyChangeListener 返回的 PropertyChangeListener 调用此方法。子类通常不需要调用此方法。支持其他 Action 属性的子类应重写此属性，并应 configurePropertiesFromAction 。

trans-unit.source: Updates the componentListener, if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 必要时,更新组件Listener。

trans-unit.source: Updates the container.
trans-unit.target: 更新容器。

trans-unit.source: Updates the container. This forwards the update to any lightweight components that are children of this container. If this method is reimplemented, super.update(g) should be called so that lightweight components are properly rendered. If a child component is entirely clipped by the current clipping setting in g, update() will not be forwarded to that child.
trans-unit.target: 更新容器。这将把更新转发给作为这个容器的子代的任何轻量级组件。如果这个方法被重新实现,应该调用super.update(g),以便正确地渲染轻量级组件。如果一个子组件完全被g中的当前剪裁设置所剪裁,那么update()将不会被转发到该子组件。

trans-unit.source: Updates the current checksum with the bytes from the specified buffer.
trans-unit.target: 用指定缓冲区的字节更新当前的校验和。

trans-unit.source: Updates the current checksum with the bytes from the specified buffer. The checksum is updated with the remaining bytes in the buffer, starting at the buffer's position. Upon return, the buffer's position will be updated to its limit; its limit will not have been changed.
trans-unit.target: 用指定缓冲区的字节更新当前的校验和。从缓冲区的位置开始,用缓冲区中的剩余字节更新校验和。返回时,缓冲区的位置将被更新到其极限值,其极限值不会被改变。

trans-unit.source: Updates the current checksum with the specified array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的字节数组更新当前的校验和。

trans-unit.source: Updates the current checksum with the specified byte.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的字节更新当前的校验和。

trans-unit.source: Updates the data to be signed or verified by a byte.
trans-unit.target: 更新要签名或验证的数据的一个字节。

trans-unit.source: Updates the data to be signed or verified using the specified ByteBuffer.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的ByteBuffer更新要签名或验证的数据。

trans-unit.source: Updates the data to be signed or verified using the specified ByteBuffer. Processes the data.remaining() bytes starting at data.position(). Upon return, the buffer's position will be equal to its limit; its limit will not have changed.

The JDBC driver will do any necessary conversion from UNICODE to the database char format.

trans-unit.source: Updates the message digest (if the digest function is on) using the specified byte, and in any case writes the byte to the output stream.

trans-unit.source: Updates the message digest (if the digest function is on) using the specified byte, and in any case writes the byte to the output stream. That is, if the digest function is on (see on), this method calls update on the message digest associated with this stream, passing it the byte b. This method then writes the byte to the output stream, blocking until the byte is actually written.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的字节更新消息摘要（如果启用了摘要功能），并且在任何情况下都将字节写入输出流。也就是说，如果摘要功能打开（请参阅 on ），则此方法对与此流关联的消息摘要调用 update ，并向其传递字节 b 。然后，此方法将字节写入输出流，直到实际写入字节为止一直阻塞。

trans-unit.source: Updates the message digest (if the digest function is on) using the specified byte, and in any case writes the byte to the output stream. That is, if the digest function is on (see on), this method calls update on the message digest associated with this stream, passing it the byte b. This method then writes the byte to the output stream, blocking until the byte is actually written.

trans-unit.source: Updates the message digest (if the digest function is on) using the specified subarray, and in any case writes the subarray to the output stream. That is, if the digest function is on (see on), this method calls update on the message digest associated with this stream, passing it the subarray specifications. This method then writes the subarray bytes to the output stream, blocking until the bytes are actually written.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的子数组更新消息摘要（如果启用了摘要功能），并且在任何情况下都将子数组写入输出流。也就是说，如果摘要功能打开（请参见 on ），则此方法将调用与此流相关联的消息摘要的 update ，并向其传递子数组规范。然后，此方法将子数组字节写入输出流，直到实际写入字节为止一直阻塞。

trans-unit.source: Updates the selection models of the table, depending on the state of the two flags: toggle and extend. Most changes to the selection that are the result of keyboard or mouse events received by the UI are channeled through this method so that the behavior may be overridden by a subclass. Some UIs may need more functionality than this method provides, such as when manipulating the lead for discontiguous selection, and may not call into this method for some selection changes.
trans-unit.target: 根据两个标志的状态更新表的选择模型： toggle 和 extend 。UI收到的键盘或鼠标事件的结果，对选择所做的大多数更改都通过此方法传递，因此该行为可以被子类覆盖。某些UI可能需要比此方法提供的功能更多的功能，例如，在处理潜在顾客以进行不连续选择时，可能不对某些选择更改调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Updating a CachedRowSet object is similar to updating a ResultSet object, but because the rowset is not connected to its data source while it is being updated, it must take an additional step to effect changes in its underlying data source. After calling the method updateRow or insertRow, a CachedRowSet object must also call the method acceptChanges to have updates written to the data source. The following example, in which the cursor is on a row in the CachedRowSet object
trans-unit.target: 更新 CachedRowSet 对象与更新 ResultSet 对象相似，但是由于行集在更新时未连接到其数据源，因此必须采取额外的步骤来影响其基础数据源中的更改。在调用方法 updateRow 或 insertRow 之后， CachedRowSet 对象还必须调用方法 acceptChanges 才能将更新写入数据源。下面的示例，其中光标位于 CachedRowSet 对象中的一行上

trans-unit.source: Usage threshold notification will be emitted by MemoryMXBean. When the Java virtual machine detects that the memory usage of a memory pool has reached or exceeded the usage threshold the virtual machine will trigger the MemoryMXBean to emit an usage threshold exceeded notification. Another usage threshold exceeded notification will not be generated until the usage has fallen below the threshold and then exceeded it again.
trans-unit.target: 使用量阈值通知将由 MemoryMXBean 发出。当Java虚拟机检测到内存池的内存使用量已达到或超过使用量阈值时，虚拟机将触发 MemoryMXBean 发出 usage threshold exceeded notification 。除非使用量已降至阈值以下，然后再次超过该阈值，否则不会生成另一个使用量超过阈值的通知。

trans-unit.source: Usages of this class should typically be of the form: ThreadLocalRandom.current().nextX(...) (where X is Int, Long, etc). When all usages are of this form, it is never possible to accidentally share a ThreadLocalRandom across multiple threads.
trans-unit.target: 此类的用法通常应为以下形式： ThreadLocalRandom.current().nextX(...) （其中 X 为 Int ， Long 等）。当所有用法都是这种形式时，永远不可能在多个线程之间意外地共享 ThreadLocalRandom 。

trans-unit.source: Use REMAINDER to specify that the component's display area will be from gridx to the last cell in the row. Use RELATIVE to specify that the component's display area will be from gridx to the next to the last one in its row.
trans-unit.target: 使用 REMAINDER 可以指定组件的显示区域是从 gridx 到该行的最后一个单元格。使用 RELATIVE 可以指定组件的显示区域是从 gridx 到其行中最后一个区域的下一个区域。

trans-unit.source: Use REMAINDER to specify that the component's display area will be from gridy to the last cell in the column. Use RELATIVE to specify that the component's display area will be from gridy to the next to the last one in its column.

trans-unit.source: Use e.getPath() to get the former parent of the deleted node(s). e.getChildIndices() returns, in ascending order, the index(es) the node(s) had before being deleted.

trans-unit.source: Use e.getPath() to get the parent of the changed node(s). e.getChildIndices() returns the index(es) of the changed node(s).

trans-unit.source: Use e.getPath() to get the path to the node. e.getChildIndices() returns null.

trans-unit.source: Use getDateInstance to get the normal date format for that country. There are other static factory methods available. Use getTimeInstance to get the time format for that country. Use getDateTimeInstance to get a date and time format. You can pass in different options to these factory methods to control the length of the result; from SHORT to MEDIUM to LONG to FULL. The exact result depends on the locale, but generally:
trans-unit.target: 使用 getDateInstance 获取该国家/地区的正常日期格式。还有其他静态工厂方法可用。使用 getTimeInstance 获取该国家/地区的时间格式。使用 getDateTimeInstance 获取日期和时间格式。您可以将不同的选项传递给这些工厂方法，以控制结果的长度。从 SHORT 到 MEDIUM 到 LONG 到 FULL 。确切结果取决于语言环境，但通常：

trans-unit.source: Use getInstance or getNumberInstance to get the normal number format. Use getIntegerInstance to get an integer number format. Use getCurrencyInstance to get the currency number format. And use getPercentInstance to get a format for displaying percentages. With this format, a fraction like 0.53 is displayed as 53%.
trans-unit.target: 使用 getInstance 或 getNumberInstance 获取常规数字格式。使用 getIntegerInstance 获取整数格式。使用 getCurrencyInstance 获取货币数字格式。并使用 getPercentInstance 获取显示百分比的格式。使用这种格式时，像0.53这样的分数显示为53％。

trans-unit.source: Use getInstance or getNumberInstance to get the normal number format. Use getIntegerInstance to get an integer number format. Use getCurrencyInstance to get the currency number format. Use getCompactNumberInstance to get the compact number format to format a number in shorter form. For example, 2000 can be formatted as "2K" in US locale. Use getPercentInstance to get a format for displaying percentages. With this format, a fraction like 0.53 is displayed as 53%.
trans-unit.target: 使用 getInstance 或 getNumberInstance 获取常规数字格式。使用 getIntegerInstance 获取整数格式。使用 getCurrencyInstance 获取货币数字格式。使用 getCompactNumberInstance 获取紧凑数字格式以将数字格式化为短格式。例如，在 US locale ，可以将 2000 格式化为 "2K" 。使用 getPercentInstance 获取显示百分比的格式。使用这种格式时，像0.53这样的分数显示为53％。

trans-unit.source: Use nextSibling to specify the child node before which the result nodes should be inserted. If nextSibling is not a descendant of node, then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown. If node is null and nextSibling is not null, then an IllegalStateException is thrown. If nextSibling is null, then the behavior is the same as calling DOMResult(Node node), i.e. append the result nodes as the last child of the specified node.
trans-unit.target: 使用 nextSibling 指定在其之前插入结果节点的子节点。如果 nextSibling 不是 node 的后代，则抛出 IllegalArgumentException 。如果 node 为 null ,并且 nextSibling 不为 null ，则 IllegalStateException 。如果 nextSibling 为 null ，则行为与调用 DOMResult(Node node) 相同，即，将结果节点附加为指定 node 的最后一个子节点。

trans-unit.source: Use nextSibling to specify the child node where the result nodes should be inserted before. If nextSibling is not a sibling of node, then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown. If node is null and nextSibling is not null, then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown. If nextSibling is null, then the behavior is the same as calling DOMResult(Node node), i.e. append the result nodes as the last child of the specified node.
trans-unit.target: 使用 nextSibling 指定子节点应在其之前插入结果节点。如果 nextSibling 不是 node 的同级，则抛出 IllegalArgumentException 。如果 node 为 null ,并且 nextSibling 不为 null ，则抛出 IllegalArgumentException 。如果 nextSibling 为 null ，则行为与调用 DOMResult(Node node) 相同，即，将结果节点附加为指定 node 的最后一个子节点。

trans-unit.source: Use nextSibling to specify the child node where the result nodes should be inserted before. If nextSibling is not a sibling of node, then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown. If node is null and nextSibling is not null, then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown. If nextSibling is null, then the behavior is the same as calling DOMResult(Node node, String systemId), i.e. append the result nodes as the last child of the specified node and use the specified System ID.
trans-unit.target: 使用 nextSibling 指定子节点应在其之前插入结果节点。如果 nextSibling 不是 node 的同级，则抛出 IllegalArgumentException 。如果 node 为 null ,并且 nextSibling 不为 null ，则抛出 IllegalArgumentException 。如果 nextSibling 为 null ，则行为与调用 DOMResult(Node node, String systemId) ，即，将结果节点附加为指定节点的最后一个子节点，并使用指定的System ID。

trans-unit.source: Use reconnect() to change the connection request controls of a context. Invoking ldapContext.reconnect() affects only the connection used by ldapContext and any new contexts instances that are derived form ldapContext. Contexts that previously shared the connection with ldapContext remain unchanged. That is, a context's connection request controls must be explicitly changed and is not affected by changes to another context's connection request controls.
trans-unit.target: 使用 reconnect() 可以更改上下文的连接请求控件。调用 ldapContext.reconnect() 仅影响由所使用的连接 ldapContext 和衍生形式的任何新的情境的实例 ldapContext 。先前与 ldapContext 共享连接的上下文保持不变。也就是说，上下文的连接请求控件必须显式更改，并且不受其他上下文的连接请求控件更改的影响。

trans-unit.source: Use of beginRequest and endRequest is optional, vendor specific and should largely be transparent. In particular implementations may detect conditions that indicate dependence on other work such as an open transaction. It is recommended though not required that implementations throw a SQLException if there is an active transaction and beginRequest is called. Using these methods may improve performance or provide other benefits. Consult your vendors documentation for additional information.
trans-unit.target: 使用 beginRequest 和 endRequest 是可选的，供应商特定的，应在很大程度上是透明的。在特定实施方式中，可以检测指示对诸如公开交易之类的其他工作的依赖性的条件。如果存在活动事务并 beginRequest ，建议（尽管并非必须）建议实现不要抛出 SQLException 。使用这些方法可以提高性能或提供其他好处。请查阅您的供应商文档以获取更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Use of a Clock is optional. All key date-time classes also have a now() factory method that uses the system clock in the default time zone. The primary purpose of this abstraction is to allow alternate clocks to be plugged in as and when required. Applications use an object to obtain the current time rather than a static method. This can simplify testing.
trans-unit.target: Clock 使用是可选的。所有关键日期时间类还具有 now() 工厂方法，该方法在默认时区使用系统时钟。这种抽象的主要目的是允许在需要时插入备用时钟。应用程序使用对象而不是静态方法来获取当前时间。这样可以简化测试。

trans-unit.source: Use of a general Object other than an ImageInputStream is intended for readers that interact directly with a capture device or imaging protocol. The set of legal classes is advertised by the reader's service provider's getInputTypes method; most readers will return a single-element array containing only ImageInputStream.class to indicate that they accept only an ImageInputStream.
trans-unit.target: 使用除 ImageInputStream 之外的常规 Object 目的是为与捕获设备或成像协议直接交互的读取器。合法类的集合由读者的服务提供者的 getInputTypes 方法发布；大多数读者将返回仅包含 ImageInputStream.class 的单元素数组，以指示他们仅接受 ImageInputStream 。

trans-unit.source: Use of a general Object other than an ImageOutputStream is intended for writers that interact directly with an output device or imaging protocol. The set of legal classes is advertised by the writer's service provider's getOutputTypes method; most writers will return a single-element array containing only ImageOutputStream.class to indicate that they accept only an ImageOutputStream.
trans-unit.target: 使用除 ImageOutputStream 之外的常规 Object 目的是为与输出设备或成像协议直接交互的编写器。合法类的集合由编写者的服务提供者的 getOutputTypes 方法发布。大多数作者将返回仅包含 ImageOutputStream.class 的单元素数组，以指示他们仅接受 ImageOutputStream 。

trans-unit.source: Use of channel bindings is optional in GSS-API. Unless the setChannelBinding method has been used to set the ChannelBinding for a GSSContext object, null ChannelBinding will be assumed.
trans-unit.target: 在GSS-API中，通道绑定的使用是可选的。可以在第一次执行 initSecContext 或 acceptSecContext 之前，使用 setChannelBinding 方法为 GSSContext 设置ChannelBinding 。除非使用 setChannelBinding 方法为GSSContext对象设置ChannelBinding，否则将假定为 null ChannelBinding。

trans-unit.source: Use the control factories specified in the LdapContext.CONTROL_FACTORIES property of the environment, and of the provider resource file associated with ctx, in that order. The value of this property is a colon-separated list of factory class names that are tried in order, and the first one that succeeds in creating the control is the one used. If none of the factories can be loaded, return ctl. If an exception is encountered while creating the control, the exception is passed up to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 依次使用环境以及与 ctx 关联的提供程序资源文件的 LdapContext.CONTROL_FACTORIES 属性中指定的控件工厂。此属性的值是按冒号分隔的工厂类名称列表，按顺序尝试这些名称，并且成功创建控件的第一个是使用的名称。如果无法加载任何工厂，则返回 ctl 。如果在创建控件时遇到异常，则该异常将传递给调用方。

trans-unit.source: Use the object factories specified in the Context.OBJECT_FACTORIES property of the environment, and of the provider resource file associated with nameCtx, in that order. If none of the factories can be loaded, return refInfo. If an exception is encountered while creating the object, the exception is passed up to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 按顺序使用环境以及与 nameCtx 关联的提供程序资源文件的 Context.OBJECT_FACTORIES 属性中指定的对象工厂。此属性的值是按冒号分隔的工厂类名称的列表，按顺序尝试这些工厂类名称，并且成功创建对象的第一个是使用的名称。如果无法加载任何工厂，则返回 refInfo 。如果在创建对象时遇到异常，则该异常将传递给调用方。

If the context class loader is null, the system class loader will be used.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to convert a GSSName and GSSCredential into a Subject.
trans-unit.target: 使用本方法将GSSName和GSSCredential转换为Subject。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to convert a GSSName and GSSCredential into a Subject. Typically this would be done by a server that wants to impersonate a client thread at the Java level by setting a client Subject in the current access control context. If the server is merely interested in using a principal based policy in its local JVM, then it only needs to provide the GSSName of the client. The elements from the GSSName are placed in the principals set of this Subject and those from the GSSCredential are placed in the private credentials set of the Subject. Any Kerberos specific elements that are added to the subject will be instances of the standard Kerberos implementation classes defined in javax.security.auth.kerberos.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法将 GSSName 和 GSSCredential 转换为 Subject。通常情况下,这将由希望在 Java 级别上通过在当前访问控制上下文中设置客户端 Subject 来冒充客户端线程的服务器来完成。如果服务器只是对在其本地 JVM 中使用基于 principal 的策略感兴趣,那么它只需要提供客户端的 GSSName。GSSName 中的元素会被放置在这个 Subject 的 principals 集中,而 GSSCredential 中的元素会被放置在这个 Subject 的 private credentials 集中。任何添加到 Subject 中的 Kerberos 特定元素都将是 javax.security.auth.kerberos 中定义的标准 Kerberos 实现类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Used by Filters to wrap either (or both) of this exchange's InputStream and OutputStream, with the given filtered streams so that subsequent calls to getRequestBody() will return the given InputStream, and calls to getResponseBody() will return the given OutputStream. The streams provided to this call must wrap the original streams, and may be (but are not required to be) sub-classes of FilterInputStream and FilterOutputStream.
trans-unit.target: 过滤器用于包装此交换的InputStream和OutputStream中的一个（或两个），以及给定的过滤流，以便对 getRequestBody() 的后续调用将返回给定的 InputStream ，对 getResponseBody() 的调用将返回给定的 OutputStream 。提供给此调用的流必须包装原始流，并且可以是（但不是必需） FilterInputStream 和 FilterOutputStream 的子类。

trans-unit.source: Used to create an event when nodes have been changed, inserted, or removed, identifying the path to the parent of the modified items as a TreePath object.
trans-unit.target: 用于在节点被更改、插入或删除时创建一个事件,将通往被修改项的父节点的路径标识为TreePath对象。

trans-unit.source: Used to create an event when nodes have been changed, inserted, or removed, identifying the path to the parent of the modified items as a TreePath object. For more information on how to specify the indexes and objects, see TreeModelEvent(Object,Object[],int[],Object[]).
trans-unit.target: 用于在节点已被更改，插入或移除时创建事件，将到修改项的父级的路径标识为TreePath对象。有关如何指定索引和对象的更多信息，请参见 TreeModelEvent(Object,Object[],int[],Object[]) 。

trans-unit.source: Used to create an event when nodes have been changed, inserted, or removed, identifying the path to the parent of the modified items as an array of Objects.
trans-unit.target: 用于在节点被更改、插入或删除时创建一个事件,将通往被修改项的父节点的路径标识为一个Object的数组。

trans-unit.source: Used to create an event when nodes have been changed, inserted, or removed, identifying the path to the parent of the modified items as an array of Objects. All of the modified objects are siblings which are direct descendents (not grandchildren) of the specified parent. The positions at which the inserts, deletes, or changes occurred are specified by an array of int. The indexes in that array must be in order, from lowest to highest.
trans-unit.target: 用于在节点已被更改，插入或移除时创建事件，将到修改项的父级的路径标识为Objects数组。所有修改后的对象都是同级兄弟姐妹，是指定父级的直接后代（不是孙辈）。插入，删除或更改发生的位置由 int 数组指定。该数组中的索引必须按从低到高的顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: Used to create an event when the node structure has changed in some way, identifying the path to the root of a modified subtree as an array of Objects.
trans-unit.target: 当节点结构发生某种变化时,用于创建一个事件,将修改后的子树根的路径标识为Objects数组。

trans-unit.source: Used to create an event when the node structure has changed in some way, identifying the path to the root of a modified subtree as an array of Objects. A structure change event might involve nodes swapping position, for example, or it might encapsulate multiple inserts and deletes in the subtree stemming from the node, where the changes may have taken place at different levels of the subtree.
trans-unit.target: 当节点结构以某种方式发生变化时,用于创建一个事件,将通往修改后的子树根的路径标识为一个Object的数组。例如,结构变化事件可能涉及到节点交换位置,也可能封装了从节点出发的子树中的多次插入和删除,这些变化可能发生在子树的不同层次。

trans-unit.source: Used to create an event when the node structure has changed in some way, identifying the path to the root of the modified subtree as a TreePath object.
trans-unit.target: 用于在节点结构发生某种变化时创建事件,将修改后的子树根部的路径标识为TreePath对象。

trans-unit.source: Used to create an event when the node structure has changed in some way, identifying the path to the root of the modified subtree as a TreePath object. For more information on this event specification, see TreeModelEvent(Object,Object[]).
trans-unit.target: 当节点结构以某种方式更改时，用于创建事件，将到修改后的子树的根的路径标识为TreePath对象。有关此事件规范的更多信息，请参见 TreeModelEvent(Object,Object[]) 。

trans-unit.source: Used to delete a rule from the media block.

trans-unit.target: 用于从样式表中删除一条规则。

trans-unit.source: Used to determine how to distribute space, which is important for specifying resizing behavior. Unless you specify a weight for at least one component in a row (weightx) and column (weighty), all the components clump together in the center of their container. This is because when the weight is zero (the default), the GridBagLayout object puts any extra space between its grid of cells and the edges of the container.
trans-unit.target: 用于确定如何分配空间，这对于指定调整大小的行为很重要。除非您为行（ weightx ）和列（ weighty ）中的至少一个组件指定一个权重，否则所有组件都将在其容器的中心聚集在一起。这是因为 GridBagLayout 重为零（默认值）时，GridBagLayout对象在其单元格网格和容器的边缘之间放置任何多余的空间。

trans-unit.source: Used to determine if the BeanContext child is avoiding using its GUI.
trans-unit.target: 用于确定 BeanContext 子级是否避免使用其GUI。

trans-unit.source: Used to determine limits on the size of the message that can be passed to wrap.
trans-unit.target: 用于确定可以传递给 wrap 的邮件大小的限制。

trans-unit.source: Used to determine limits on the size of the message that can be passed to wrap. Returns the maximum message size that, if presented to the wrap method with the same confReq and qop parameters, will result in an output token containing no more than maxTokenSize bytes.
trans-unit.target: 用于确定可以传递给 wrap 的邮件大小的限制。返回最大消息大小，如果使用相同的 confReq 和 qop 参数将其提供给 wrap 方法，则该消息最大大小将导致输出令牌的最大令牌 maxTokenSize 不超过maxTokenSize字节。

trans-unit.source: Used to determine what to display.

trans-unit.source: Used to display a "Tip" for a Component.

trans-unit.source: Used to display a "Tip" for a Component. Typically components provide api to automate the process of using ToolTips. For example, any Swing component can use the JComponentsetToolTipText method to specify the text for a standard tooltip. A component that wants to create a custom ToolTip display can override JComponent's createToolTip method and use a subclass of this class.
trans-unit.target: 用于显示组件的“提示”。通常，组件提供api来自动化使用 ToolTip 的过程。例如，任何Swing组件都可以使用 JComponent setToolTipText 方法来指定标准工具提示的文本。想要创建自定义 ToolTip 显示的组件可以重写 JComponent 的 createToolTip 方法并使用此类的子类。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate whether of not we are running in an environment where GUI interaction is available.
trans-unit.target: 用于表示我们是否运行在一个有GUI交互的环境中。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate whether or not an event can have its default action prevented.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示一个事件是否可以阻止其默认动作。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate whether or not an event can have its default action prevented. If the default action can be prevented the value is true, else the value is false.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示一个事件是否可以阻止其默认动作。如果默认动作可以被阻止,则值为true,否则值为false。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate whether or not an event is a bubbling event.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示事件是否为冒泡事件。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate whether or not an event is a bubbling event. If the event can bubble the value is true, else the value is false.
trans-unit.target: 用来表示一个事件是否是冒泡事件。如果事件可以冒泡,则该值为真,否则为假。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate whether the 'alt' key was depressed during the firing of the event.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示在事件发射期间是否按下了'alt'键。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate whether the 'alt' key was depressed during the firing of the event. On some platforms this key may map to an alternative key name.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示在事件发射期间是否按下了 "alt "键。在某些平台上,该键可能映射到另一个键名。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate whether the 'ctrl' key was depressed during the firing of the event.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示在事件发生时是否按下了 "ctrl "键。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate whether the 'meta' key was depressed during the firing of the event.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示在事件发射过程中,"元 "键是否被按下。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate whether the 'meta' key was depressed during the firing of the event. On some platforms this key may map to an alternative key name.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示在事件发射期间是否按下了 "元 "键。在某些平台上,该键可能映射到另一个键名。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate whether the 'shift' key was depressed during the firing of the event.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示在事件发射期间是否按下了 "shift "键。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate which phase of event flow is currently being evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 用于表示当前正在评估事件流的哪个阶段。

trans-unit.source: Used to insert a new rule into the media block.
trans-unit.target: 用于在媒体块中插入新的规则。

trans-unit.source: Used to insert a new rule into the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 用于在样式表中插入一条新规则。

trans-unit.source: Used to insert a new rule into the style sheet. The new rule now becomes part of the cascade.
trans-unit.target: 用于在样式表中插入一条新规则。新规则现在成为级联的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Used to layout a BasicSplitPaneDivider.
trans-unit.target: 用于布局 BasicSplitPaneDivider 。

trans-unit.source: Used to layout a BasicSplitPaneDivider. Layout for the divider involves appropriately moving the left/right buttons around.
trans-unit.target: 用于布局 BasicSplitPaneDivider 。分隔线的布局涉及适当地左右移动按钮。

trans-unit.source: Used to make half-open intervals.
trans-unit.target: 用来做半开区间。

trans-unit.source: Used to messaged registered listeners.
trans-unit.target: 用来给注册的听众发消息。

trans-unit.source: Used to paint the TreeCellRenderer.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制TreeCellRenderer。

trans-unit.source: Used to process tokens generated by the wrap method on the other side of the context.
trans-unit.target: 用于处理上下文另一侧由 wrap 方法生成的令牌。

trans-unit.source: Used to process tokens generated by the wrap method on the other side of the context. The method will return the message supplied by the peer application to its wrap call, while at the same time verifying the embedded MIC for that message.
trans-unit.target: 用于处理上下文另一侧由 wrap 方法生成的令牌。该方法会将对等应用程序提供的消息返回到其包装调用，同时验证该消息的嵌入式MIC。

trans-unit.source: Used to quote special characters in a prefix or suffix, for example, "'#'#" formats 123 to "#123". To create a single quote itself, use two in a row: "# o''clock".
trans-unit.target: 用于在前缀或后缀中引用特殊字符，例如， "'#'#" 格式从123到 "#123" 。要自己创建一个单引号，请连续使用两个： "# o''clock" 。

trans-unit.source: Used to remove a CSS property if it has been explicitly set within this declaration block.
trans-unit.target: 如果CSS属性已在此声明块中明确设置,则用于删除该属性。

trans-unit.source: Used to render the currently selected item in the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 用于在组合框中呈现当前选中的项目。

trans-unit.source: Used to render the currently selected item in the combo box. It doesn't have anything to do with the popup's rendering.
trans-unit.target: 用于渲染组合框中当前选中的项目。它与弹出窗口的渲染没有任何关系。

trans-unit.source: Used to represent the object name of an MBean and its class name.
trans-unit.target: 用来表示MBean的对象名和它的类名。

trans-unit.source: Used to represent the object name of an MBean and its class name. If the MBean is a Dynamic MBean the class name should be retrieved from the MBeanInfo it provides.
trans-unit.target: 用于表示MBean的对象名称及其类名称。如果MBean是动态MBean，则应从其提供的 MBeanInfo 中检索类名称。

trans-unit.source: Used to respond to a request to quit the application.
trans-unit.target: 用于响应退出申请的请求。

trans-unit.source: Used to retrieve a CSSValue by ordinal index.
trans-unit.target: 用于按序号索引检索 CSSValue 。

trans-unit.source: Used to retrieve a CSSValue by ordinal index. The order in this collection represents the order of the values in the CSS style property. If index is greater than or equal to the number of values in the list, this returns null.
trans-unit.target: 用于按序号索引检索 CSSValue 。此集合中的顺序代表CSS样式属性中值的顺序。如果index大于或等于列表中的值数，则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: Used to retrieve a CSS rule by ordinal index.
trans-unit.target: 用于通过序数索引来检索CSS规则。

trans-unit.source: Used to retrieve a CSS rule by ordinal index. The order in this collection represents the order of the rules in the CSS style sheet. If index is greater than or equal to the number of rules in the list, this returns null.
trans-unit.target: 用于按序号索引检索CSS规则。此集合中的顺序代表CSS样式表中规则的顺序。如果index大于或等于列表中的规则数，则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: Used to retrieve a style sheet by ordinal index.
trans-unit.target: 用于按序号索引检索样式表。

trans-unit.source: Used to retrieve a style sheet by ordinal index. If index is greater than or equal to the number of style sheets in the list, this returns null.
trans-unit.target: 用于按序号索引检索样式表。如果index大于或等于列表中的样式表数，则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: Used to retrieve the object representation of the value of a CSS property if it has been explicitly set within this declaration block.
trans-unit.target: 用于检索CSS属性值的对象表示,如果该属性已在该声明块中明确设置。

trans-unit.source: Used to retrieve the object representation of the value of a CSS property if it has been explicitly set within this declaration block. This method returns null if the property is a shorthand property. Shorthand property values can only be accessed and modified as strings, using the getPropertyValue and setProperty methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果已在此声明块中明确设置了CSS属性值，则用于检索该对象的对象表示形式。如果该属性是简写属性，则此方法返回 null 。速记属性值只能使用 getPropertyValue 和 setProperty 方法访问并修改为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Used to retrieve the priority of a CSS property (e.g. the "important" qualifier) if the priority has been explicitly set in this declaration block.
trans-unit.target: 如果已在此声明块中明确设置了优先级，则用于检索CSS属性的优先级（例如 "important" 限定符）。

trans-unit.source: Used to retrieve the properties that have been explicitly set in this declaration block.
trans-unit.target: 用于检索该声明块中已明确设置的属性。

trans-unit.source: Used to retrieve the properties that have been explicitly set in this declaration block. The order of the properties retrieved using this method does not have to be the order in which they were set. This method can be used to iterate over all properties in this declaration block.
trans-unit.target: 用于检索在此声明块中已明确设置的属性。使用此方法检索到的属性的顺序不一定是它们被设置的顺序。此方法可用于遍历此声明块中的所有属性。

trans-unit.source: Used to retrieve the value of a CSS property if it has been explicitly set within this declaration block.
trans-unit.target: 用于检索CSS属性的值,如果该属性在此声明块中被明确设置的话。

trans-unit.source: Used to see most DTD declarations except those treated as lexical ("document element name is ...") or which are mandatory for all SAX parsers (DTDHandler). The Object must implement org.xml.sax.ext.DeclHandler.
trans-unit.target: 用于查看大多数DTD声明，除了那些被视为词法（“文档元素名称为...”）或对于所有SAX解析器都是必需的声明（DTDHandler）。该对象必须实现org.xml.sax.ext.DeclHandler。

trans-unit.source: Used to see some syntax events that are essential in some applications: comments, CDATA delimiters, selected general entity inclusions, and the start and end of the DTD (and declaration of document element name). The Object must implement org.xml.sax.ext.LexicalHandler.
trans-unit.target: 用于查看某些应用程序中必不可少的语法事件：注释，CDATA分隔符，选定的常规实体包含以及DTD的开始和结束（以及文档元素名称的声明）。该对象必须实现org.xml.sax.ext.LexicalHandler。

trans-unit.source: Used to serialize all children of this BeanContext.
trans-unit.target: 用于序列化此 BeanContext 的所有子级。

trans-unit.source: Used to set a property value and priority within this declaration block.
trans-unit.target: 用于设置该声明块中的属性值和优先级。

trans-unit.source: Used to set a property value and priority within this declaration block. setProperty permits to modify a property or add a new one in the declaration block. Any call to this method may modify the order of properties in the item method.
trans-unit.target: 用于在此声明块内设置属性值和优先级。 setProperty 允许修改属性或在声明块中添加新属性。对此方法的任何调用都可以修改 item 方法中属性的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Used to set the horizontal scroll bar policy so that horizontal scrollbars are always displayed.
trans-unit.target: 用于设置水平滚动条策略,使水平滚动条始终显示。

trans-unit.source: Used to set the horizontal scroll bar policy so that horizontal scrollbars are displayed only when needed.
trans-unit.target: 用于设置水平滚动条策略,使水平滚动条只在需要时才显示。

trans-unit.source: Used to set the horizontal scroll bar policy so that horizontal scrollbars are never displayed.
trans-unit.target: 用于设置水平滚动条策略,使水平滚动条永远不显示。

trans-unit.source: Used to set the vertical scroll bar policy so that vertical scrollbars are always displayed.
trans-unit.target: 用于设置垂直滚动条策略,使垂直滚动条始终显示。

trans-unit.source: Used to set the vertical scroll bar policy so that vertical scrollbars are displayed only when needed.
trans-unit.target: 用于设置垂直滚动条策略,使垂直滚动条只在需要时才显示。

trans-unit.source: Used to set the vertical scroll bar policy so that vertical scrollbars are never displayed.
trans-unit.target: 用于设置垂直滚动条策略,使垂直滚动条永不显示。

trans-unit.source: Used to signal that no position is available.
trans-unit.target: 用于发出没有仓位的信号。

trans-unit.source: Used to specify the amount of time before the user has to wait initialDelay milliseconds before a tooltip will be shown.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定用户在显示工具提示之前必须等待 initialDelay 毫秒的时间。

trans-unit.source: Used to specify the amount of time before the user has to wait initialDelay milliseconds before a tooltip will be shown. That is, if the tooltip is hidden, and the user moves into a region of the same Component that has a valid tooltip within milliseconds milliseconds the tooltip will immediately be shown. Otherwise, if the user moves into a region with a valid tooltip after milliseconds milliseconds, the user will have to wait an additional initialDelay milliseconds before the tooltip is shown again.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定用户在显示工具提示之前必须等待 initialDelay 毫秒的时间。也就是说，如果隐藏了工具提示，并且用户进入了同一组件的区域，该区域在 milliseconds 毫秒）内具有有效的工具提示，则将立即显示该工具提示。否则，如果用户在 milliseconds 毫秒）后移入具有有效工具提示的区域，则用户将不得不等待额外的 initialDelay 毫秒，才能再次显示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Used to specify the time (in milliseconds relative to the epoch) at which the event was created.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定事件创建的时间(相对于纪元的毫秒)。

trans-unit.source: Used to specify the time (in milliseconds relative to the epoch) at which the event was created. Due to the fact that some systems may not provide this information the value of timeStamp may be not available for all events. When not available, a value of 0 will be returned. Examples of epoch time are the time of the system start or 0:0:0 UTC 1st January 1970.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定创建事件的时间（相对于纪元的毫秒数）。由于某些系统可能未提供此信息，因此 timeStamp 的值可能不适用于所有事件。如果不可用，将返回0值。纪元时间的示例是系统启动时间或1970年1月1日UTC时间0：0：0。

trans-unit.source: Used to specify what label will be drawn at any given value.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定在任何给定值下绘制什么标签。

trans-unit.source: Used to specify what label will be drawn at any given value. The key-value pairs are of this format: { Integer value, java.swing.JComponent label }.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定将在任何给定值上绘制的标签。键值对具有以下格式： { Integer value, java.swing.JComponent label } 。

trans-unit.source: Used to test if a particular set of TreePaths can be added.
trans-unit.target: 用于测试是否可以添加特定的 TreePath 集。

trans-unit.source: Used to test if a particular set of TreePaths can be added. This will return true if paths is null (or empty), or this object has no RowMapper, or nothing is currently selected, or the selection mode is DISCONTIGUOUS_TREE_SELECTION, or adding the paths to the current selection still results in a contiguous set of TreePaths.
trans-unit.target: 用于测试是否可以添加特定的 TreePath 集。如果 paths 为null（或为空），或者此对象没有RowMapper，或者当前未选择任何东西，或者选择模式为 DISCONTIGUOUS_TREE_SELECTION ，则返回true ，或者将路径添加到当前选择中仍会导致 TreePath 的连续集合。

trans-unit.source: Used when the component's display area is larger than the component's requested size to determine whether (and how) to resize the component. Possible values are GridBagConstraints.NONE (the default), GridBagConstraints.HORIZONTAL (make the component wide enough to fill its display area horizontally, but don't change its height), GridBagConstraints.VERTICAL (make the component tall enough to fill its display area vertically, but don't change its width), and GridBagConstraints.BOTH (make the component fill its display area entirely).
trans-unit.target: 当组件的显示区域大于组件的请求大小时使用，以确定是否（以及如何）调整组件的大小。可能的值为 GridBagConstraints.NONE （默认值）， GridBagConstraints.HORIZONTAL （使组件足够宽以水平填充其显示区域，但不更改其高度）， GridBagConstraints.VERTICAL （使组件足够高以填充其显示区域。垂直，但不要更改其宽度）和 GridBagConstraints.BOTH （使组件完全填充其显示区域）。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for AM_PM field alignment.
trans-unit.target: 对AM_PM字段对齐有用的常数。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for AM_PM field alignment. Used in FieldPosition of date/time formatting.
trans-unit.target: 用于AM_PM字段对齐的有用常数。在日期/时间格式化的FieldPosition中使用。

trans-unit.target: 对DATE字段对齐有用的常数。

trans-unit.target: 用于DATE字段对齐的有用常数。在日期/时间格式化的FieldPosition中使用。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for DAY_OF_WEEK field alignment.
trans-unit.target: 对DAY_OF_WEEK字段对齐有用的常数。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for DAY_OF_WEEK field alignment. Used in FieldPosition of date/time formatting.
trans-unit.target: 用于 DAY_OF_WEEK 字段对齐的有用常量。在日期/时间格式化的FieldPosition中使用。

trans-unit.target: 对 DAY_OF_WEEK_IN_MONTH 字段对齐有用的常数。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for DAY_OF_WEEK_IN_MONTH field alignment. Used in FieldPosition of date/time formatting.
trans-unit.target: 用于 DAY_OF_WEEK_IN_MONTH 字段对齐的有用常量。用于日期/时间格式化的FieldPosition。

trans-unit.target: 对 DAY_OF_YEAR 字段对齐有用的常数。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for DAY_OF_YEAR field alignment. Used in FieldPosition of date/time formatting.
trans-unit.target: 用于 DAY_OF_YEAR 字段对齐的有用常量。用于日期/时间格式化的FieldPosition。

trans-unit.target: 有用的常数,用于ERA领域对齐。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for ERA field alignment. Used in FieldPosition of date/time formatting.
trans-unit.target: 用于 ERA 字段对齐的有用常数。在日期/时间格式化的FieldPosition中使用。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for MILLISECOND field alignment.
trans-unit.target: 对MILLISECOND字段对齐有用的常数。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for MILLISECOND field alignment. Used in FieldPosition of date/time formatting.
trans-unit.target: 用于MILLISECOND字段对齐的有用常数。在日期/时间格式化的FieldPosition中使用。

trans-unit.target: 用于MINUTE领域对齐的有用常数。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for MINUTE field alignment. Used in FieldPosition of date/time formatting.
trans-unit.target: 用于MINUTE字段对齐的有用常数。在日期/时间格式化的FieldPosition中使用。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for MONTH field alignment.
trans-unit.target: 月字段对齐的有用常数。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for MONTH field alignment. Used in FieldPosition of date/time formatting.
trans-unit.target: 用于MONTH字段对齐的有用常数。在日期/时间格式化的FieldPosition中使用。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for SECOND field alignment.
trans-unit.target: 有用的常数,用于SECOND字段对齐。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for SECOND field alignment. Used in FieldPosition of date/time formatting.
trans-unit.target: 用于SECOND字段对齐的有用常数。在日期/时间格式化的FieldPosition中使用。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for TIMEZONE field alignment.
trans-unit.target: 对时区字段对齐有用的常数。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for TIMEZONE field alignment. Used in FieldPosition of date/time formatting.
trans-unit.target: 用于TIMEZONE字段对齐的有用常数。在日期/时间格式化的FieldPosition中使用。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for WEEK_OF_MONTH field alignment.
trans-unit.target: 对WEEK_OF_MONTH字段对齐有用的常数。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for WEEK_OF_MONTH field alignment. Used in FieldPosition of date/time formatting.
trans-unit.target: 用于WEEK_OF_MONTH字段对齐的有用常量。在日期/时间格式化的FieldPosition中使用。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for WEEK_OF_YEAR field alignment.
trans-unit.target: 对WEEK_OF_YEAR字段对齐有用的常数。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for WEEK_OF_YEAR field alignment. Used in FieldPosition of date/time formatting.
trans-unit.target: 用于WEEK_OF_YEAR字段对齐的有用常量。用于日期/时间格式化的FieldPosition。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for YEAR field alignment.
trans-unit.target: 年字段对齐的有用常数。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for YEAR field alignment. Used in FieldPosition of date/time formatting.
trans-unit.target: 用于YEAR字段对齐的有用常数。在日期/时间格式化的FieldPosition中使用。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for country.
trans-unit.target: 对国家有用的常数。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for language.
trans-unit.target: 语言的有用常数。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for one-based HOUR field alignment.
trans-unit.target: 有用的常数,用于单基HOUR场对齐。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for one-based HOUR field alignment. Used in FieldPosition of date/time formatting. HOUR1_FIELD is used for the one-based 12-hour clock. For example, 11:30 PM + 1 hour results in 12:30 AM.
trans-unit.target: 用于一基HOUR字段对齐的有用常数。用于日期/时间格式化的FieldPosition。HOUR1_FIELD用于一基12小时的时钟。例如,11:30 PM+1小时的结果是12:30 AM。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for one-based HOUR_OF_DAY field alignment.
trans-unit.target: 有用的常量,适用于基于单日的HOUR_OF_DAY字段对齐。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for one-based HOUR_OF_DAY field alignment. Used in FieldPosition of date/time formatting. HOUR_OF_DAY1_FIELD is used for the one-based 24-hour clock. For example, 23:59 + 01:00 results in 24:59.
trans-unit.target: 对基于一的HOUR_OF_DAY字段对齐有用的常数。用于日期/时间格式化的FieldPosition。HOUR_OF_DAY1_FIELD用于基于一的24小时时钟。例如,23:59+01:00的结果是24:59。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for the root locale.
trans-unit.target: 对根目录有用的常数。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for the root locale. The root locale is the locale whose language, country, and variant are empty ("") strings. This is regarded as the base locale of all locales, and is used as the language/country neutral locale for the locale sensitive operations.
trans-unit.target: 对根 locale 有用的常量。根locale是语言、国家和变体为空("")字符串的locale。它被认为是所有locale的基础locale,并且被用作locale敏感操作的语言/国家中性locale。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for zero-based HOUR field alignment.
trans-unit.target: 零基HOUR场对齐的有用常数。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for zero-based HOUR field alignment. Used in FieldPosition of date/time formatting. HOUR0_FIELD is used for the zero-based 12-hour clock. For example, 11:30 PM + 1 hour results in 00:30 AM.
trans-unit.target: 用于基于零的HOUR字段对齐的有用常数。用于日期/时间格式化的FieldPosition。HOUR0_FIELD用于基于零的12小时时钟。例如,11:30 PM+1小时的结果是00:30 AM。

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for zero-based HOUR_OF_DAY field alignment.

trans-unit.source: Useful constant for zero-based HOUR_OF_DAY field alignment. Used in FieldPosition of date/time formatting. HOUR_OF_DAY0_FIELD is used for the zero-based 24-hour clock. For example, 23:59 + 01:00 results in 00:59.

trans-unit.source: Users can supersede the Java runtime currency data by means of the system property java.util.currency.data. If this system property is defined then its value is the location of a properties file, the contents of which are key/value pairs of the ISO 3166 country codes and the ISO 4217 currency data respectively. The value part consists of three ISO 4217 values of a currency, i.e., an alphabetic code, a numeric code, and a minor unit. Those three ISO 4217 values are separated by commas. The lines which start with '#'s are considered comment lines. An optional UTC timestamp may be specified per currency entry if users need to specify a cutover date indicating when the new data comes into effect. The timestamp is appended to the end of the currency properties and uses a comma as a separator. If a UTC datestamp is present and valid, the JRE will only use the new currency properties if the current UTC date is later than the date specified at class loading time. The format of the timestamp must be of ISO 8601 format : 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'. For example,
trans-unit.target: 用户可以通过系统属性 java.util.currency.data 取代Java运行时货币数据。。如果定义了此系统属性，则其值是属性文件的位置，其内容分别是ISO 3166国家/地区代码和ISO 4217货币数据的键/值对。值部分由货币的三个ISO 4217值组成，即字母代码，数字代码和次要单位。这三个ISO 4217值用逗号分隔。以“＃”开头的行被视为注释行。如果用户需要指定指示新数据何时生效的截止日期，则可以为每个货币条目指定一个可选的UTC时间戳。时间戳被附加到货币属性的末尾，并使用逗号作为分隔符。如果存在UTC日期戳并且有效，仅当当前UTC日期晚于类加载时指定的日期时，JRE才会使用新的货币属性。时间戳记格式必须为ISO 8601格式： 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss' 。例如，

trans-unit.source: Users of this API are typically developers who produce client library implementations for connection-based protocols, such as LDAPv3 and IMAPv4, and developers who write servers (such as LDAP servers and IMAP servers). Developers who write client libraries use the SaslClient and SaslClientFactory interfaces. Developers who write servers use the SaslServer and SaslServerFactory interfaces. Among these two groups of users, each can be further divided into two groups: those who produce the SASL mechanisms and those who use the SASL mechanisms. The producers of SASL mechanisms need to provide implementations for these interfaces, while users of the SASL mechanisms use the APIs in this package to access those implementations.
trans-unit.target: 此API的用户通常是为基于连接的协议（例如LDAPv3和IMAPv4）生成客户端库实现的开发人员，以及编写服务器（例如LDAP服务器和IMAP服务器）的开发人员。编写客户端库的开发人员使用 SaslClient 和 SaslClientFactory 接口。编写服务器的开发人员使用 SaslServer 和 SaslServerFactory 接口。在这两组用户中，每个用户可以进一步分为两组：产生 SASL机制的用户和使用 SASL机制的用户。SASL机制。SASL机制的生产者需要为这些接口提供实现，而SASL机制的用户则使用此包中的API来访问这些实现。

trans-unit.source: Uses "The Base64 Alphabet" as specified in Table 1 of RFC 2045 for encoding and decoding operation. The encoded output must be represented in lines of no more than 76 characters each and uses a carriage return '\r' followed immediately by a linefeed '\n' as the line separator. No line separator is added to the end of the encoded output. All line separators or other characters not found in the base64 alphabet table are ignored in decoding operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用RFC 2045的表1中指定的“ Base64字母”进行编码和解码操作。编码后的输出必须以不超过76个字符的行表示，并使用回车符 '\r' 后跟换行符 '\n' 作为行分隔符。没有行分隔符添加到编码的输出的末尾。在base64字母表中找不到的所有行分隔符或其他字符在解码操作中将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Uses "The Base64 Alphabet" as specified in Table 1 of RFC 4648 and RFC 2045 for encoding and decoding operation. The encoder does not add any line feed (line separator) character. The decoder rejects data that contains characters outside the base64 alphabet.
trans-unit.target: 使用RFC 4648和RFC 2045表1中规定的 "Base64字母表 "进行编码和解码操作。编码器不添加任何换行(行分隔符)字符。解码器拒绝包含base64字母表以外的字符的数据。

trans-unit.source: Uses for this method include facilitating data validation when interoperating with XML processors that would always require undesirable network accesses for external entities, or which for other reasons adopt a "no DTDs" policy. Non-validation motives include forcing documents to include DTDs so that attributes are handled consistently. For example, an XPath processor needs to know which attibutes have type "ID" before it can process a widely used type of reference.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法的用途包括在与XML处理器互操作时促进数据验证,因为XML处理器总是需要对外部实体进行不受欢迎的网络访问,或者由于其他原因采用 "无DTD "政策。非验证动机包括强迫文档包含DTD,以便一致地处理属性。例如,一个XPath处理器在处理一个广泛使用的引用类型之前,需要知道哪些属性具有 "ID "类型。

trans-unit.source: Uses streams to process tokens generated by the wrap method on the other side of the context. The method will return the message supplied by the peer application to its wrap call, while at the same time verifying the embedded MIC for that message.
trans-unit.target: 使用流来处理上下文另一侧由 wrap 方法生成的令牌。该方法会将对等应用程序提供的消息返回到其包装调用，同时验证该消息的嵌入式MIC。

trans-unit.source: Uses streams to produce a token containing a cryptographic MIC for the supplied message, for transfer to the peer application. Unlike wrap, which encapsulates the user message in the returned token, only the message MIC is produced in the output token. This method is equivalent to the byte array based getMIC method. Note that privacy can only be applied through the wrap call.
trans-unit.target: 使用流来生成包含所提供消息的加密MIC的令牌，以传输到对等应用程序。与将用户消息封装在返回的令牌中的wrap不同，在输出令牌中仅生成消息MIC。此方法等效于基于字节数组的 getMIC 方法。请注意，隐私只能通过wrap调用来应用。

trans-unit.source: Uses streams to verify the cryptographic MIC, contained in the token parameter, over the supplied message. This method is equivalent to the byte array based verifyMIC method. The MessageProp object is instantiated by the application and is used by the underlying mechanism to return information to the caller such as the QOP indicating the strength of protection that was applied to the message and other supplementary message state information.
trans-unit.target: 使用流通过提供的消息来验证令牌参数中包含的加密MIC。此方法等效于基于字节数组的 verifyMIC 方法。MessageProp对象由应用程序实例化，并由基础机制用来将信息返回给调用方，例如QOP，它指示应用于消息的保护强度以及其他补充消息状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Uses the "The Base64 Alphabet" as specified in Table 1 of RFC 2045 for encoding and decoding operation. The encoded output must be represented in lines of no more than 76 characters each and uses a carriage return '\r' followed immediately by a linefeed '\n' as the line separator. No line separator is added to the end of the encoded output. All line separators or other characters not found in the base64 alphabet table are ignored in decoding operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用RFC 2045表1中指定的“ Base64字母”进行编码和解码操作。编码后的输出必须以不超过76个字符的行表示，并使用回车符 '\r' 后跟换行符 '\n' 作为行分隔符。没有行分隔符添加到编码的输出的末尾。在base64字母表中找不到的所有行分隔符或其他字符在解码操作中将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Uses the "URL and Filename safe Base64 Alphabet" as specified in Table 2 of RFC 4648 for encoding and decoding. The encoder does not add any line feed (line separator) character. The decoder rejects data that contains characters outside the base64 alphabet.
trans-unit.target: 使用RFC 4648表2中指定的 "URL和文件名安全Base64字母表 "进行编码和解码。编码器不添加任何换行(行分隔符)字符。解码器拒绝包含base64字母表以外的字符的数据。

trans-unit.source: Using onExit is an alternative to waitFor that enables both additional concurrency and convenient access to the result of the Process. Lambda expressions can be used to evaluate the result of the Process execution. If there is other processing to be done before the value is used then onExit is a convenient mechanism to free the current thread and block only if and when the value is needed.
trans-unit.target: 使用 onExit 是waitFor的替代方法， waitFor 可以实现额外的并发性，又可以方便地访问Process的结果。Lambda表达式可用于评估流程执行的结果。如果在使用该值之前还有其他处理要做，那么onExit是一种方便的机制，用于仅在需要该值时以及在需要该值时释放当前线程并阻塞。

trans-unit.source: Using an MBean proxy is just a convenience. The second example ends up calling the same MBeanServer operations as the first one.
trans-unit.target: 使用MBean代理只是一种方便。第二个示例最终调用与第一个示例相同的 MBeanServer 操作。

trans-unit.source: Using an MXBean proxy is a convenience remote access to a platform MXBean of a running virtual machine. All method calls to the MXBean proxy are forwarded to an MBeanServerConnection where IOException may be thrown when the communication problem occurs with the connector server. If thrown, IOException will be wrappped in UndeclaredThrowableException. An application remotely accessing the platform MXBeans using proxy should prepare to catch UndeclaredThrowableException and handle its cause as if that cause had been thrown by the MBeanServerConnection interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用MXBean代理是对正在运行的虚拟机的平台MXBean的便捷远程访问。对MXBean代理的所有方法调用都转发到 MBeanServerConnection ，当连接器服务器发生通信问题时，可能会引发 IOException 。如果抛出 IOException ,则将其包装在 UndeclaredThrowableException 中。使用代理远程访问平台MXBean的应用程序应准备捕获 UndeclaredThrowableException 并处理其原因，就好像该原因已由 MBeanServerConnection 接口抛出一样。

All method calls to the MXBean proxy are forwarded to an MBeanServerConnection where IOException may be thrown when the communication problem occurs with the connector server. If thrown, IOException will be wrappped in UndeclaredThrowableException. An application remotely accessing the platform MXBeans using proxy should prepare to catch UndeclaredThrowableException and handle its cause as if that cause had been thrown by the MBeanServerConnection interface.

trans-unit.source: Using an MXBean proxy is a convenience remote access to a platform MXBean of a running virtual machine. All method calls to the MXBean proxy are forwarded to an MBeanServerConnection where IOException may be thrown when the communication problem occurs with the connector server. An application remotely accesses the platform MXBeans using proxy should prepare to catch IOException as if accessing with the MBeanServerConnector interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用MXBean代理是对正在运行的虚拟机的平台MXBean的便捷远程访问。对MXBean代理的所有方法调用都转发到 MBeanServerConnection ，当连接器服务器发生通信问题时，可能会引发 IOException 。应用程序使用代理远程访问平台MXBeans应该准备捕获 IOException ，就像使用 MBeanServerConnector 接口进行访问一样。

trans-unit.source: Using anchoring bounds, the boundaries of this matcher's region match anchors such as ^ and $.
trans-unit.target: 使用锚定边界,该匹配器区域的边界与^和$等锚点相匹配。

trans-unit.source: Using factory methods in the Lookup API, any class member represented by a Core Reflection API object can be converted to a behaviorally equivalent method handle. For example, a reflective Method can be converted to a method handle using Lookup.unreflect. The resulting method handles generally provide more direct and efficient access to the underlying class members.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Lookup API中的工厂方法，可以将Core Reflection API对象表示的任何类成员转换为行为上等效的方法句柄。例如，可以使用 Lookup.unreflect 将反射 Method 转换为方法句柄。生成的方法句柄通常提供对底层类成员的更直接和有效的访问。

trans-unit.source: Using factory methods in the Lookup API, any class member represented by a Core Reflection API object can be converted to a behaviorally equivalent method handle. For example, a reflective Method can be converted to a method handle using Lookup.unreflect. The resulting method handles generally provide more direct and efficient access to the underlying class members.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Lookup API 中的工厂方法，可以将Core Reflection API对象表示的任何类成员转换为行为等效的方法句柄。例如，可以使用 Lookup.unreflect 将反射 Method 转换为方法句柄。生成的方法句柄通常提供对底层类成员的更直接和有效的访问。

trans-unit.source: Using factory methods in the Lookup API, any field represented by a Core Reflection API object can be converted to a behaviorally equivalent VarHandle. For example, a reflective Field can be converted to a VarHandle using Lookup.unreflectVarHandle. The resulting VarHandles generally provide more direct and efficient access to the underlying fields.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Lookup API中的工厂方法，可以将Core Reflection API对象表示的任何字段转换为行为等效的VarHandle。例如，可以使用 Lookup.unreflectVarHandle 将反射 Field 转换为VarHandle。生成的VarHandles通常可提供对底层字段的更直接和有效的访问。

trans-unit.source: Using getDataElements/setDataElements to transfer between two DataBuffer/SampleModel pairs is legitimate if the SampleModels have the same number of bands, corresponding bands have the same number of bits per sample, and the TransferTypes are the same.
trans-unit.target: 使用getDataElements/setDataElements在两个DataBuffer/SampleModel对之间进行传输是合法的,如果SampleModel具有相同的频段数,对应的频段数与每个样本的位数相同,并且TransferTypes相同。

trans-unit.source: Using lenient resolution will resolve the values in an appropriate lenient manner. Individual fields will interpret this differently.
trans-unit.target: 使用宽松的解析方式将以适当的宽松方式解析这些值。各个字段会有不同的解释。

trans-unit.source: Using localized styles, such as long or medium
trans-unit.target: 使用本地化样式，例如 long 或 medium

trans-unit.source: Using modes such as CFB and OFB, block ciphers can encrypt data in units smaller than the cipher's actual block size. When requesting such a mode, you may optionally specify the number of bits to be processed at a time by appending this number to the mode name as shown in the "AES/CFB8/NoPadding" and "AES/OFB32/PKCS5Padding" transformations. If no such number is specified, a provider-specific default is used. (See the JDK Providers Documentation for the JDK Providers default values.) Thus, block ciphers can be turned into byte-oriented stream ciphers by using an 8 bit mode such as CFB8 or OFB8.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CFB 和 OFB 之类的模式，分组密码可以以小于密码实际分组大小的单位加密数据。请求这种模式时，您可以选择将每次处理的位数附加到模式名称中，以指定一次要处理的位数，如 AES/CFB8/NoPadding 和 AES/OFB32/PKCS5Padding 转换所示。如果未指定该数字，则使用特定于提供程序的默认值。（有关JDK提供程序的默认值，请参见JDK提供程序文档。）因此，可以使用8位模式（例如CFB8或OFB8）将分组密码转换为面向字节的流密码。

trans-unit.source: Using modes such as CFB and OFB, block ciphers can encrypt data in units smaller than the cipher's actual block size. When requesting such a mode, you may optionally specify the number of bits to be processed at a time by appending this number to the mode name as shown in the "AES/CFB8/NoPadding" and "AES/OFB32/PKCS5Padding" transformations. If no such number is specified, a provider-specific default is used. (See the JDK Providers Documentation for the JDK Providers default values.) Thus, block ciphers can be turned into byte-oriented stream ciphers by using an 8 bit mode such as CFB8 or OFB8.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CFB 和 OFB 之类的模式，分组密码可以以小于密码实际分组大小的单位加密数据。请求这种模式时，您可以选择将每次处理的位数附加到模式名称中，以指定一次要处理的位数，如 AES/CFB8/NoPadding 和 AES/OFB32/PKCS5Padding 转换所示。如果未指定该数字，则使用特定于提供程序的默认值。（有关JDK提供程序的默认值，请参见JDK提供程序文档。）因此，可以使用8位模式（例如CFB8或OFB8）将分组密码转换为面向字节的流密码。

trans-unit.source: Using modes such as CFB and OFB, block ciphers can encrypt data in units smaller than the cipher's actual block size. When requesting such a mode, you may optionally specify the number of bits to be processed at a time by appending this number to the mode name as shown in the "DES/CFB8/NoPadding" and "DES/OFB32/PKCS5Padding" transformations. If no such number is specified, a provider-specific default is used. (For example, the SunJCE provider uses a default of 64 bits for DES.) Thus, block ciphers can be turned into byte-oriented stream ciphers by using an 8 bit mode such as CFB8 or OFB8.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CFB 和 OFB 之类的模式，分组密码可以以小于密码实际分组大小的单位加密数据。请求这种模式时，您可以选择一次指定要处理的位数，方法是将此数字附加到模式名称中，如“ DES/CFB8/NoPadding ”和“ DES/OFB32/PKCS5Padding ”转换所示。如果未指定此数字，则使用提供程序特定的默认值。 （例如，SunJCE提供程序对DES使用默认的64位。）因此，可以使用8位模式（例如CFB8或OFB8）将块密码转换为面向字节的流密码。

trans-unit.source: Using non-ISO calendar systems in an application introduces significant extra complexity. Ensure that the warnings and recommendations in ChronoLocalDate have been read before working with the "chrono" interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序中使用非ISO日历系统会带来极大的额外复杂性。在使用“ chrono”界面之前，请确保已阅读 ChronoLocalDate 中的警告和建议。

trans-unit.target: 使用正常的涂料/事件力学,结果是1a出现在底部,5a高于其他所有组件。

trans-unit.source: Using opaque bounds, the boundaries of this matcher's region are opaque to lookahead, lookbehind, and boundary matching constructs that may try to see beyond them. Those constructs cannot look past the boundaries so they will fail to match anything outside of the region.
trans-unit.target: 使用不透明的边界,这个匹配器区域的边界对那些试图看清边界的 lookahead、lookbehind 和边界匹配构造是不透明的。这些构造体无法看穿边界,所以它们将无法匹配区域外的任何东西。

trans-unit.source: Using smart resolution will perform the sensible default for each field, which may be the same as strict, the same as lenient, or a third behavior. Individual fields will interpret this differently.
trans-unit.target: 使用智能解析将为每个字段执行合理的默认值,它可能和严格一样,也可能和宽松一样,或者是第三种行为。各个字段会有不同的解释。

trans-unit.source: Using strict resolution will ensure that all parsed values are within the outer range of valid values for the field. Individual fields may be further processed for strictness.
trans-unit.target: 使用严格的分辨率将确保所有解析的值都在字段有效值的外部范围内。可以进一步处理单个字段的严格程度。

trans-unit.source: Using the AWTKeyStroke API, client code can specify on which of two specific KeyEvents, KEY_PRESSED or KEY_RELEASED, the focus traversal operation will occur. Regardless of which KeyEvent is specified, however, all KeyEvents related to the focus traversal key, including the associated KEY_TYPED event, will be consumed, and will not be dispatched to any Component. It is a runtime error to specify a KEY_TYPED event as mapping to a focus traversal operation, or to map the same event to multiple default focus traversal operations.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AWTKeyStroke API，客户端代码可以指定在其上的两个特定 KeyEvent S， KEY_PRESSED 或 KEY_RELEASED ，会发生焦点遍历操作。但是，无论指定哪个 KeyEvent ，与焦点遍历键相关的所有 KeyEvent ，包括关联的 KEY_TYPED 事件都将被使用，并且不会分派给任何 Component 。将 KEY_TYPED 事件指定为映射到焦点遍历操作，或者将同一事件映射到多个默认焦点遍历操作是运行时错误。

trans-unit.source: Using the AWTKeyStroke API, client code can specify on which of two specific KeyEvents, KEY_PRESSED or KEY_RELEASED, the focus traversal operation will occur. Regardless of which KeyEvent is specified, however, all KeyEvents related to the focus traversal key, including the associated KEY_TYPED event, will be consumed, and will not be dispatched to any Component. It is a runtime error to specify a KEY_TYPED event as mapping to a focus traversal operation, or to map the same event to multiple default focus traversal operations.
trans-unit.target: 使用AWTKeyStroke API,客户端代码可以指定在KEY_PRESSED或KEY_RELEASED这两个特定的KeyEvents中的哪一个上进行焦点遍历操作。然而,无论指定哪一个KeyEvent,所有与焦点遍历键相关的KeyEvents,包括相关的KEY_TYPED事件,都将被消耗,而不会被派发到任何Component。指定一个KEY_TYPED事件作为焦点遍历操作的映射,或者将同一个事件映射到多个默认的焦点遍历操作,都是运行时错误。

trans-unit.source: Using the AWTKeyStroke API, client code can specify on which of two specific KeyEvents, KEY_PRESSED or KEY_RELEASED, the focus traversal operation will occur. Regardless of which KeyEvent is specified, however, all KeyEvents related to the focus traversal key, including the associated KEY_TYPED event, will be consumed, and will not be dispatched to any Container. It is a runtime error to specify a KEY_TYPED event as mapping to a focus traversal operation, or to map the same event to multiple default focus traversal operations.
trans-unit.target: 使用AWTKeyStroke API,客户端代码可以指定在KEY_PRESSED或KEY_RELEASED这两个特定的KeyEvents中的哪一个上进行焦点遍历操作。然而,无论指定哪一个KeyEvent,所有与焦点遍历键相关的KeyEvents,包括相关的KEY_TYPED事件,都将被消耗,而不会被派发到任何Container。指定一个KEY_TYPED事件作为焦点遍历操作的映射,或者将同一事件映射到多个默认的焦点遍历操作,都是运行时错误。

trans-unit.source: Using the class to generate input events differs from posting events to the AWT event queue or AWT components in that the events are generated in the platform's native input queue. For example, Robot.mouseMove will actually move the mouse cursor instead of just generating mouse move events.
trans-unit.target: 使用类生成输入事件与将事件发布到AWT事件队列或AWT组件不同，因为事件是在平台的本机输入队列中生成的。例如， Robot.mouseMove 实际上将移动鼠标光标，而不仅仅是生成鼠标移动事件。

trans-unit.source: Using the search filter, it is possible to register interest in objects that do not exist at the time of registration but later come into existence and satisfy the filter. However, there might be limitations in the extent to which this can be supported by the service provider and underlying protocol/service. If the caller submits a filter that cannot be supported in this way, addNamingListener() throws an InvalidSearchFilterException.
trans-unit.target: 使用搜索过滤器，可以对注册时不存在但后来出现并满足过滤条件的对象进行注册。但是，服务提供商和基础协议/服务可以支持的程度可能有所限制。如果调用方提交了无法通过这种方式支持的过滤器，则 addNamingListener() 会抛出 InvalidSearchFilterException 。

trans-unit.source: Using this method allows the use of an alternate clock for testing. The alternate clock may be introduced using dependency injection.

trans-unit.source: Using this method hard codes a dependency to the default time-zone into your application. It is recommended to avoid this and use a specific time-zone whenever possible. The UTC clock should be used when you need the current instant without the date or time.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法将对默认时区的依赖项硬编码到您的应用程序中。建议避免这种情况，并尽可能使用特定的时区。该 UTC clock ，当你需要不带日期或时间的当前时刻应该被使用。

trans-unit.target: 使用透明边界,这个匹配器区域的边界对lookahead、lookbehind和边界匹配构造是透明的。这些构造可以看到区域边界之外的情况,以查看匹配是否合适。

trans-unit.source: Usually an application that uses a logging framework will log messages through a logger facade defined (or supported) by that framework. Applications that wish to use an external framework should log through the facade associated with that framework.
trans-unit.target: 通常,使用日志记录框架的应用程序将通过该框架定义(或支持)的日志记录器门面记录消息。希望使用外部框架的应用程序应通过与该框架相关的门面进行记录。

trans-unit.source: Usually the MBeanInfo for any given MBean does not change over the lifetime of that MBean. Dynamic MBeans can change their MBeanInfo and in that case it is recommended that they emit a Notification with a type of "jmx.mbean.info.changed" and a userData that is the new MBeanInfo. This is not required, but provides a conventional way for clients of the MBean to discover the change. See also the immutableInfo and infoTimeout fields in the MBeanInfoDescriptor.
trans-unit.target: 通常，任何给定MBean的 MBeanInfo 在该MBean的生存期内均不会更改。动态MBean可以改变他们 MBeanInfo ，并在这种情况下，建议他们发出 Notification 有型的 "jmx.mbean.info.changed" 和用户数据是新 MBeanInfo 。这不是必需的，但为MBean的客户提供了一种发现更改的常规方法。另请参见 MBeanInfo Descriptor 的immutableInfo和infoTimeout字段。

trans-unit.source: Usually the MBeanInfo for any given MBean does not change over the lifetime of that MBean. This is not required, but provides a conventional way for clients of the MBean to discover the change. See also the immutableInfo and infoTimeout fields in the MBeanInfoDescriptor.
trans-unit.target: 通常，任何给定MBean 的 MBeanInfo 在该MBean的生存期内均不会更改。动态MBean可以改变他们 MBeanInfo ，并在这种情况下，建议他们发出 Notification 有型的 "jmx.mbean.info.changed" 和用户数据是新 MBeanInfo 。这不是必需的，但是为MBean的客户提供了一种发现更改的常规方法。另请参见 MBeanInfo Descriptor 的immutableInfo和infoTimeout字段。

trans-unit.target: 用于检查InetAddress是否为环回地址的实用程序。

trans-unit.source: Utility routine to check if the InetAddress is a site local address.
trans-unit.target: 用于检查InetAddress是否为站点本地地址的实用程序。

trans-unit.source: Utility routine to check if the InetAddress is a wildcard address.
trans-unit.target: 用于检查InetAddress是否为通配符地址的实用程序。

trans-unit.source: Utility routine to check if the InetAddress is an IP multicast address.
trans-unit.target: 用于检查InetAddress是否为IP组播地址的实用程序。

trans-unit.source: Utility routine to check if the InetAddress is an IP multicast address. 11111111 at the start of the address identifies the address as being a multicast address.
trans-unit.target: 用于检查InetAddress是否为IP组播地址的实用程序。地址开头的1111111表示该地址是一个组播地址。

trans-unit.source: Utility routine to check if the InetAddress is an IP multicast address. IP multicast address is a Class D address i.e first four bits of the address are 1110.
trans-unit.target: 用于检查InetAddress是否为IP组播地址的实用程序。IP组播地址是一个D类地址,即地址的前四位是1110。

trans-unit.source: Utility routine to check if the InetAddress is an IPv4 compatible IPv6 address.
trans-unit.target: 用于检查InetAddress是否为IPv4兼容的IPv6地址的实用程序。

trans-unit.source: Utility routine to check if the InetAddress is an link local address.
trans-unit.target: 用于检查InetAddress是否为链接本地地址的实用程序。

trans-unit.source: Utility routine to check if the multicast address has global scope.
trans-unit.target: 用于检查多播地址是否具有全局范围的实用程序。

trans-unit.source: Utility routine to check if the multicast address has link scope.
trans-unit.target: 用于检查多播地址是否具有链路范围的实用程序。

trans-unit.source: Utility routine to check if the multicast address has node scope.
trans-unit.target: 用于检查多播地址是否具有节点范围的实用程序。

trans-unit.source: Utility routine to check if the multicast address has organization scope.
trans-unit.target: 用于检查多播地址是否具有组织范围的实用程序。

trans-unit.source: Utility routine to check if the multicast address has site scope.
trans-unit.target: 用于检查多播地址是否具有站点范围的实用程序。
